title: 求助:疑似mcforge的问题，建服客户端相关
author: summer65663
txt_content:
之前发错区了，抱歉哈……麻烦版主帮删下http://forum.mcbbs.net:8080/thread-18006-1-1.html




建服，服务端一切安好，客户端不行，疑似mcforge问题，版本1.3.2.0，装完ic2之类的大型mod直接崩溃，装小地图神马的就没事，求助下，谢大神，我实在没办法了……
客户端版本1.1，装过1.1中文补丁，下面的报告是装完铁路mod之后的

报告如下：


Mods loaded: 3
ModLoader 1.1
mod_ModLoaderMp 1.0.0
mod_ReiMinimap v3.0_01 [1.1]

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.

If you wish to report this, please copy this entire text and email it to support@mojang.com.
Please include a description of what you did when the error occured.
